Privacy Policy for Snag Signal

Last updated: 2023-11-14

1. Introduction

Our app, Snag Signal, is designed to emit tones when your phone is taken without your permission. This privacy policy sets out how we use and protect any information that you give while using Snag Signal.

2. Information Collection and Use

Snag Signal does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data. The app functions without the need for user authentication and does not integrate with third-party services.

3. User Responsibilities

By using Snag Signal, you acknowledge and agree that its use is at your own risk. The app is designed to emit tones to alert you of unauthorized access to your phone, and we are not responsible for any direct or indirect consequences that may arise from its use.

4. Disclaimer of Liability

The developer of Snag Signal is not liable for any damages or losses resulting from the use of the app. This includes, but is not limited to, any damage to your device, loss of data, or personal injury. You are solely responsible for ensuring that the app is used in a manner compliant with all applicable laws and regulations.

5. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

6. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
